## Token.mint() method

Mints the specified amount of new tokens

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mint(amount: Amount): Promise<TransactionResult>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | Amount | The amount of tokens to mint |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;TransactionResult&gt;

the transaction result of the mint

## Example


```jsx
const tx = await program.mint(1);
```
